DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter randomize control trial ( RCT ) test effect dialogue-based psychosocial intervention stroke acute survivor primary care one six month poststroke . Primary outcome psycho-social health wellbeing , measure GHQ28 ( primary outcome ) SAQoL ( secondary outcome ) . 400 stroke survivor randomize intervention group control group . Patients follow 12 month .
